thread.title: Bieber, One Direction Share Same Release Date
thread.title_full: Bieber, One Direction Share Same Release Date

title: Bieber, One Direction Share Same Release Date
text:
Photos AP File Photos 
WASHINTGTON: Justin Bieber and One Direction seem to be in a musical battle with each other, as both happen to share the same release date for their latest ventures. 
Poking some friendly fun during his competition, the 21-year-old singer shared a video on his snapchat few weeks back, saying, “The face you make when you come out with an album the same day as Justin Bieber”, E! Online reports. 
The boy band’s third track ‘Perfect’ from the upcoming album ‘Made in the A.M’ and Bieber’s latest album ‘Purpose’ share the same release date November 13.
